headline: Ecolab (ECL) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Christophe Beck: Thank you, Andy, and welcome to everyone joining us today.  In the third quarter, sales growth improved, with pricing accelerating to 3% from 2% last quarter, while volumes increased 1%.  This momentum was driven by double-digit organic growth in our growth engines, which include pest elimination, life sciences, global high-tech, and Ecolab Digital.

headline: Ecolab Q3 profit rises 13% on pricing
summary: Investing.com -- Ecolab on Tuesday reported third-quarter adjusted earnings of $2.07 per share, up 13% from a year earlier and in line with analysts’ estimates, as higher prices and margin expansion offset weaker demand in some markets.

raw.headline: Ecolab Q3 profit rises 13% on pricing

headline: Ecolab: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.06 per share. The cleaning, food-safety and pest-control services company posted revenue of $4.17 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts.

headline: Evaluating Ecolab (ECL) Valuation as Recent Momentum Draws Investor Interest
summary: Ecolab (ECL) has caught the attention of investors lately, with shares moving slightly higher over the past month. Recent trends in the market have prompted renewed interest in Ecolab’s valuation and long-term outlook. See our latest analysis for Ecolab. Ecolab’s share price has gained steady ground this year, climbing over 21% year-to-date. Its one-year total shareholder return sits at a healthy 10%. Recent momentum hints at renewed optimism, especially as the stock notched a 3% share price...
